subtitle: Coffee served with whiskey and cream

method.text: Heat a stemmed whiskey glass. Pour in the whiskey. Add the sugar. Fill with coffee to within 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm of the top of the glass.
Top with the cream, poured over the back of a spoon to prevent curdling. Do NOT stir the coffee so the hot coffee and whiskey is enjoyed through the cool cream. Serve.

title: Gaelic (Irish) coffee
